Instruction: Preheat your oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Prepare a 12-cup muffin pan by greasing it or lining it with muffin papers.
Combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, and salt in a large bowl. Create a well in the center, then add egg, shortening, and milk. Mix until fully incorporated, then fill muffin cups with the batter.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
